title: Lybrate: Consult A Doctor Online
description:
Lybrate is the best online doctor consultation app that has revolutionized the way people in India think and take care of their health and fitness needs. Consult a Doctor Online as we provide you with a secure, easy and friendly platform to connect with highly trained medical experts. Buy health products online safely and securely with great discounts and cashback offers only at GoodKart.
We are India's #1 Medical platform to provide online doctor consultation connecting over 10 million users to over 100,000 top doctors of the country. You can ask a FREE question about health or fitness and get multiple helpful answers from the best of the best doctors within a few minutes.
Users can also find doctors from all major specialities in the app and can either consult them online instantly or book an appointment to visit their clinic at a preferred time!
At Lybrate, You Can:
- Consult Doctors Online
- Buy Health Products Online
- Ask FREE Health Questions
- Book Online Doctor appointment
- Read Health Tips
Consult Doctors Online: You can consult doctors online personally via a text chat. We also offer online doctor consultation via video call to share medical records, lab test reports and past medical history.
GoodKart - Buy Health Products Online curated by a panel of experts. GoodKart is Lybrate’s endeavor to deliver the best of the best Health care products at your doorstep.
Ask FREE Health Questions: Ask a doctor about your health or fitness related questions anonymously. Get answers to your health queries from qualified doctors within a few minutes.
Book Appointments with Doctors: Book appointment online with doctors and medical experts. Find doctors online in Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata, Pune, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chandigarh, and many other major cities of India.
Receive Health Tips: Get valuable health tips and suggestions on a wide range of health issues from trusted doctors. These tips range from Ayurveda remedies and home remedies to clinical treatments and surgeries to diet plans and other fitness advice.
Consult Doctors Online Or Book Online Doctor appointment:
Find Doctors from the following Specialties to consult online or to book an appointment:
Ear Nose and Throat, Ayurveda, General Physician, Pediatrician, Dentist, Physiotherapist, Gastroenterologist, Cardiologist, Dietitian-Nutritionist, Endocrinologist, Ophthalmologist, Dermatologist, Gynecologist/Gynecologist, Sexologist, And More.
GoodKart - Buy Health Products Online
We bring to you a vibrant mix of health products as healthy living starts with a healthy body. Shop health and wellness products online without standing in any queue. You can browse health products from a comprehensive assortment of Vitamins and Supplements, Protein & Fitness, Skin & Hair Care, Sexual Wellness, Weight Management, Food & Drinks, Personal Care and Child Care Products.
Ask FREE Health Questions To Doctors Online
Doctors associated with Lybrate have answered millions of user’s questions and have attended thousands of patients to help with their health problems:
Awards & Recognition:
✪ Among the World's Most Innovative Companies of 2016 in Healthcare by FastCompany ✪
✪ Most Promising Start-Up of the Year at VCCircle Healthcare Awards 2015 ✪
✪ Lybrate is the Indian Medical Association's Digital Partner ✪
Lybrate is the best website for online doctor consultation available on the web for you. Consult doctors online or book an appointment with them at https://www.lybrate.com. We are working against all odds for bringing you specially curated top of the line health products.
We'd love to hear from you. Questions, comments or ideas on how to improve the app? Drop us a line at hello@lybrate.com or tweet us @Lybrate.
